command.text:
declare @$control char(5), @message nvarchar(4000), @$unitName nvarchar(1023), @$costUnit bit select @$costUnit = rtrim(val) from options where name = 'm_gt_dvcs' select @message = 'var f = this;f._costUnit = ' + rtrim(@$costUnit) + ';'&Control;
if exists(select 1 from options where name = 'm_gia_vt' and val <> '1') or exists(select 1 from options where name = 'm_gia_nh_kho' and val <> '1') select @message = @message + 'setObjectFilterHidden(f, ''nhom_kho'', false);'
if substring(@$control, 1, 1) = 1 and @$costUnit <> 1 select @message = @message + 'setObjectFilterHidden(f, ''ma_dvcs'', false);'
if substring(@$control, 2, 1) = 1 and exists (select 1 from options where name = 'm_gia_vt' and val <> '2') select @message = @message + 'setObjectFilterHidden(f, ''ma_kho'', false);'
if substring(@$control, 3, 1) = 1 and substring(@$control, 1, 1) = 1 and @$costUnit = 1 begin select @$unitName = case when @@language = 'V' then ten_dvcs else ten_dvcs2 end from dmdvcs where ma_dvcs = @@unit select @message = @message + 'this._unitCode=''' + @@unit + ''';this._unitName=''' + replace(replace(isnull(@$unitName, ''), '\', '\\'), '''', '\''') + '''' end select @message as message return
